valid_password_required: A valid password is required (at least 8 characters with at least 1 upper case, 1 lower case, 1 numeric and 1 symbol).
password_sent: Your password has been changed. Please log back in using your new password.
valid_link_required: You will need a valid reset link in order to reset your password.
go_to_forgotten_password: Click below to go to the forgot password screen.

errors.min_length: Please make sure your password is at least 8 characters long.
errors.not_same: Please make sure your password is same as the password above.
errors.submit_error: There was an error with resetting your password. Please try again and contact support if the problem persists.
errors.INVALID_TOKEN: Your token was invalid, please try the forgotten password form again.
